name: wordpress-post
description: This extension posts articles to WordPress.

wordpress-post.siteUrl.description: URL of WordPress, used create relative url

wordpress-post.slugKeys.description: List of slug to ID conversions

wordpress-post.slugSepalator.description: Separator for file names to be added

wordpress-post.typeAttachedImageSlug.description: Processing rules for attached image file names.
enumDescriptions: Add a document slug prefix to the original file name
Add a document slug suffix to the original file name

wordpress-post.mediaTypes.description: File extensions and media types to enable.

wordpress-post.useLinkableImage.description: Add a tag to img tag

wordpress-post.useLinkableImageOnlyIfSiz.description: Enable link only if linked image size is different from image size in img tag. To use this feature, please enable "Use Linkable Image" also.

wordpress-post.enableLinkify.description: Auto-convert URL-like text to links if enabled.

wordpress-post.defaultFeaturedImageId.description: The ID of the featured image when there was no image

wordpress-post.image.addTitleAttribute.description: Add title attribute to img tag using alt attribute value if title is not specified in Markdown.

wordpress-post.image.addSizeAttributes.description: Add hight and width attributes to img tag.

wordpress-post.image.resize.description: Resize image size down to max width or max height if exceeds. To use this feature you need to specify either max width or max height at least. In addition, size attributes are automatically added to img tag if this option is true.

wordpress-post.image.maxWidth.description: Max image width. Image will be resized down to this width when image->resize is enabled. Use 0 to specify no limit.

wordpress-post.image.maxHeight.description: Max image height. Image will be resized down to this height when image->resize is enabled. Use 0 to specify no limit.

wordpress-post.image.resizeJpegUseMozjpe.description: Use mozjpeg to reduce JPEG file size when resizing.

wordpress-post.image.resizePngUsePalette.description: Use palette (index color) to reduce PNG file size when resizing.

wordpress-post.codeBlockLanguagePrefix.description: Prefix of class name for code block

wordpress-post.codeBlockTag.description: HTML tag which specifies language class
enumDescriptions: Add class for language to <code> tag
Add class for language to <pre> tag

wordpress-post.formatHtmlAddBlankLineToH.description: Add a blank line before/after heading tag respectively when formatting HTML.

wordpress-post.formatHtmlAddBlankLineToT.description: Add a blank line before/after table block respectively when formatting HTML.

wordpress-post.formatHtmlAddBlankLineToP.description: Add a blank line before/after preformatted block respectively when formatting HTML.

wordpress-post.formatHtmlAddBlankLineToD.description: Add a blank line before/after div block respectively when formatting HTML.
